patthana4.7:1.1: Akusalaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:2.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:4.1: Kusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:5.1: Akusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:6.1: Abyākataṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:7.1: Kusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbañca abyākataṁ nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:8.1: Akusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbañca abyākataṁ nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:11.1: Kusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo kusalassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:12.1: Akusalo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo akusalassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:13.1: Abyākato nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo abyākatassa nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:14.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:16.1: Akusalaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:17.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:19.1: Kusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:20.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana4.7:21.1: Akusalaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:22.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana4.7:31.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:33.1: Kusalaṁ savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:36.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ, avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:38.1: Kusalo savitakko dhammo kusalassa savitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.7:39.1: Akusalo savitakko dhammo akusalassa savitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.7:40.1: Abyākato savitakko dhammo abyākatassa savitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.7:41.1: Kusalo savitakko dhammo kusalassa savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:42.1: Akusalo savitakko dhammo akusalassa savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:43.1: Abyākato savitakko dhammo abyākatassa savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:44.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, anantare satta …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane tīṇi, kamme pañca, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe… sampayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:46.1: Kusalaṁ avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:47.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ, avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:49.1: Kusalo avitakko dhammo kusalassa avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:50.1: Abyākato avitakko dhammo abyākatassa avitakkassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:51.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre indriye cattāri, jhāne magge pañca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate dasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:53.1: Kusalaṁ savicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo savicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Kusalasavitakkasadisaṁ.)
patthana4.7:54.1: Kusalaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:55.1: Akusalaṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:56.1: Abyākataṁ sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:57.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana4.7:61.1: Abyākato sappītiko dhammo abyākatassa sappītikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

Kusalaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kusalaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:74.1: Kusalaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo kāmāvacaro ca abyākato kāmāvacaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana4.7:147.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana4.7:148.1: Kusalaṁ sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:149.1: Akusalaṁ sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:150.1: Abyākataṁ sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:151.1: Kusalaṁ sauttarañca abyākataṁ sauttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:152.1: Akusalaṁ sauttarañca abyākataṁ sauttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:153.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana4.7:154.1: Kusalo sauttaro dhammo kusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:155.1: Akusalo sauttaro dhammo akusalassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:156.1: Abyākato sauttaro dhammo abyākatassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:157.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:158.1: Kusalaṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:159.1: Abyākataṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:160.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ, avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:162.1: Kusalo anuttaro dhammo kusalassa anuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.7:163.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo abyākatassa anuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.7:164.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo abyākatassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.7:165.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo kusalassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:166.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:168.1: Akusalaṁ saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:171.1: Kusalaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:172.1: Abyākataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:173.1: Kusalaṁ araṇañca abyākataṁ araṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:174.1: Kusalaṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana4.7:175.1: Abyākataṁ araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:176.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:178.1: Kusalo araṇo dhammo kusalassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:179.1: Abyākato araṇo dhammo abyākatassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana4.7:180.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
